sentences.sentence: CT scan plays an important role in finding pericolic infiltration, distal ileal involvement and lymphadenopathy.
sentences.translation: CT 扫描在发现心包浸润、远端回肠受累和淋巴结病变中起重要作用。

sentences.sentence: Ileal digestibility is more accurate than fecal.
sentences.translation: 回肠消化率比粪消化率准确。

sentences.sentence: A peptide release is also part of the "ileal brake" mechanism.
sentences.translation: 肽的释放也是“回肠制动”机制的一部分。
